post.caption: Spill the tea, besties! ‚òïÔ∏è What Fenty Beauty product are you absolutely OBSESSED with right now? üëá We wanna know what's making you glow! ‚ú®
post.call_to_action: Comment below with your fave Fenty Beauty product!
post.image_prompt: A flat lay image, shot from directly overhead, featuring a curated selection of Fenty Beauty products arranged artfully on a light pink, slightly textured background. The lighting is bright, diffused, and even, creating a soft, inviting atmosphere. Key products include a Killawatt Freestyle Highlighter compact (open, showing the shimmer), a Gloss Bomb Universal Lip Luminizer (tube laying horizontally), a Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Foundation bottle (standing upright), and a Match Stix Matte Contour Skinstick (angled slightly). Scattered around the products are loose, iridescent glitter particles in shades of pink, gold, and lavender. The composition is balanced, with negative space allowing each product to stand out. The overall aesthetic is clean, modern, and luxurious, reflecting the Fenty Beauty brand identity. The image should evoke feelings of excitement, glamour, and accessibility. The style should be high-resolution and suitable for a professional beauty brand Instagram feed.
